name: SNLWeekChartView
summary: SNLWeekChartView is a wrapper to easily create a [JBChartView](https://github.com/Jawbone/JBChartView) representing a week.
description: Using IB_DESIGNABLE you can add a SNLWeekChartView to your storyboard to configure and preview it right there. This view configures and handles a JBChartView.
